title: How to Trade the Risk Currencies, Such as the Aussie Dollar
text:
How to join a webinar: Sign in to your Investing.com account

Click the "Enroll Now" button

20 minutes before the session starts, you can access the webinar here by clicking the 'Start Webinar' button.

Never miss a session by adding a reminder to your calendar.

Success! An email was sent to your inbox. Invite your friends to join

You are no doubt aware of how impactful the major news releases can be.Traders gravitate to the major news releases to access more trading opportunities.Join our news trading specialist, Russell Sandiford, as he runs through how the big picture narrative fits in with the short-term price action on the chart. In this webinar, Russell will go through a live analysis on how to take advantage of the current AUD volatility, plus other key FX pairs.Consider Russell your trading coach around playing the major news events. Russell lives and breathes the markets daily, and he'll share his mindset around the key events you must watch this week.· Understand the key macroeconomic events driving the FX markets right now· Identify trading opportunities based around the major news releases in the next 24-48 hours· Gain clarity on the currency pairs which will stand to win or lose based on the unfolding global events· You will have a blueprint of the dominant market forces driving the market right now and the big picture opportunities to focus on· Based on Russell’s macro-based concepts, you will get clear short-term trading opportunities based on sensible risk-reward levels· How Russell manages his FX trading fund and the mindset he has in marrying the fundamentals with the technical levels on the chartIf you are ready to gain clarity around the global markets, understand what it takes to build clear trading signals and manage your risk like a professional, then register for Russell’s informative webinar today.We look forward to chatting with you soon.Russell Sandiford, one of the most reputable market analysts in Australia with over 16 years’ experience across FX, indices and commodities, is nothing short of a powerhouse of extraordinary talent in cutting through the nonsense and pinpointing trading opportunities for traders.Russell's passion for the FX markets and in particular his ability to decipher market-moving news has been a standout focus that traders find extremely useful.Don’t miss the opportunity to join Russell and see how he reads the markets so you can capture the bigger market moves today.
